entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 7:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
